text: Golgotha is the fifteenth studio album by American heavy metal band W.A.S.P.. The album was released on October 2, 2015 through Napalm Records, and is W.A.S.P.'s first studio album since Babylon (2009), marking the longest gap between two studio albums in their career. Golgotha is also W.A.S.P.'s last studio album with drummer Mike Dupke, who left the band just prior to its release. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;W.A.S.P. * Blackie Lawless – lead vocals, guitars, keyboards, producer * Doug Blair – lead guitars, backing vocals * Mike Duda – bass ;Additional musicians * Michael Dupke – drums ;Production *Michael Dupke, Mark Zavon, Jun Murakawa – engineers *Logan Mader – mixing ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !align="center"|Year !align="center"|Chart !align="center"|Position |- |align="center" rowspan="15"|2015 |align="center"|Top Hard Rock Albums (US) |align="center"|5 |- |align="center"|Swedish Albums Chart |align="center"|6 |- |align="center"|Top Independent Albums (US) |align="center"|9 |- |align="center"|UK Independent Albums Chart |align="center"|10 |- |align="center"|Finnish Albums Chart |align="center"|13 |- |align="center"|Norwegian Albums Chart |align="center"|17 |- |align="center"|German Albums Chart |align="center"|18 |- |align="center"|Spanish Albums Chart |align="center"|32 |- |align="center"|Austrian Top 40 Albums |align="center"|33 |- |align="center"|Swiss Albums Top 100 |align="center"|36 |- |align="center"|UK Albums Chart |align="center"|50 |- |align="center"|Belgian Ultratop (Wallonia) |align="center"|52 |- |align="center"|Belgian Ultratop (Flanders) |align="center"|93 |- |align="center"|Billboard 200 (US) |align="center"|93 |- |align="center"|French Albums Chart |align="center"|153 |} ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:W.A.S.P. albums Category:Napalm Records albums Category:Albums produced by Blackie Lawless
